articles.description: 'Strong circumstantial evidence of associations between vitamin D and the severity of Covid-19 responses, including death,' say researchers
articles.content:
Vitamin D appears to help reduce serious complications among coronavirus patients, according to a study.

articles.title: More than 250 cases of coronavirus in Pembrokeshire - Western Telegraph
articles.description: THREE new cases of coronavirus have been identified in Pembrokeshire as of today, May 11, bringing the total to 251.
articles.content:
THREE new cases of coronavirus have been identified in Pembrokeshire as of today, May 11, bringing the total to 251.
Ceredigion saw no new cases, for a total of 38, while Carmarthenshire saw 11 new cases, for a total of 558.

articles.title: COVID-19 patient deaths at Surrey NHS trust hospitals rise to 993 - Get Surrey
articles.description: A further 209 hospital deaths were recorded across the country, according to NHS England
articles.content:
The number of coronavirus deaths at Surrey NHS trust hospitals has increased to 993.
